GapFillDragDrop.Title: -ed / -ing adjectives
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose a word and drag it to the correct space.

Content.Question:
1. It’s very confusing when the twins wear the same clothes. I can’t tell who is who!
2. The lecture was so boring that I fell asleep half-way through.
3. We all felt very annoyed with Doug for forgetting the tickets.
4. Chloe became terribly depressed after her mother’s death.
5. The children were so excited about going to Disneyland that they couldn’t
sleep.
6. My sister’s got a really annoying habit: she always leaves her clothes on our
bedroom floor.
7. I was confused by Lana’s text message. I didn’t understand where to meet.
8. Are you interested in films?
9. People in the UK often find winter very depressing and they are much happier
as soon as spring arrives.
10. Dash is an exciting new film from the makers of Siren II. It is non-stop action
all the way.
